answers.author: Susan Thorpe
answers.text:
The City of Peoria AZ uses the FASTER system for fleet. For detailed info please call Charlie Johnson, 623-773-7495. we do not have a facility asset management system, but we need one, so I'd love to know what you find out. Good luck in your search.

answers.author: Rob Mallick
answers.text:
Joshua, I say your question while searching around and was  just wondering if you had any luck finding an inexpensive software. The City of Burlingame uses GBA which is a great CMMS, but can get pricey. We have built some in the past using Access.

author: Joshua Fruecht
text: Are there any inexpensive software applications for Fleet and Facility Asset management? Possibly even something that is offered as Software-as-a-Service (SAAS). What does your City use?
title: Seeking Inexpensive Software Application for Fleet and Facility Asset Management
